p: During prior influenza epidemics, more patients died of CV causes than pneumonia/influenza causes [ 49]. Given the high inflammatory burden of COVID-19, significant CV complications with COVID-19 infection are expected. Previous reports have suggested that COVID-19 leads to CV complications or deterioration of pre-existing CVD [ 7, 8, 20, 42, 50]. The potential CV complications following COVID-19 are described in Table 2 and Figure 1.
